name: Mino (MartinU77)
description:
In this game you'll help Mino repair his spaceship after it was damaged during an emergency landing. You will search for help from animals and fulfill small tasks in return. In the animals tasks, you have to get them different objects, such as strawberries or honey.

At the end you will repair your UFO and then leave the earth.

This Game is my second semester project for the htk academy and it was made in 6 months.

Feedback or opinions on the game are greatly appreciated.

The game uses audios from:

Epidemic Sound - https://www.epidemicsound.com/music/featured/

Weloveindies - https://www.weloveindies.com/en
